aka: A.W. A Portrait of Apichatpong Weersethakul

cast.name: 阿彼察邦·韦拉斯哈古 Apichatpong Weerasethakul

this_title: A.W. A Portrait of Apichatpong Weerasethakul
trans_title: 阿彼察邦·韦拉斯哈古的画像
A.W. A Portrait of Apichatpong Weersethakul
introduction: Canadian actor and filmmaker Connor Jessup profiles Apichatpong Weerasethakul, a maverick of Thai cinema who explores the slippery nature of time and consciousness with a sublimely idiosyncratic, often surreal approach to film form. Shot in the Colombian jungle, where Apichatpong was scouting locations last year for his next project, this rare glimpse at the director's creative world delves into the dreams and desires that fuel his work.
chinese_title: 阿彼察邦·韦拉斯哈古的画像
foreign_title: A.W. A Portrait of Apichatpong Weerasethakul
